item.title: Running/Debugging Arquillian Integration-Tests with WildFly inside IntelliJ 15
item.description: Unfortunately integration testing needs a great effort to be set up. But once you have it up and running you benefit from being able to examine how multiple parts are working together. Configure the embedded container using maven Add an Arquillian profile to your pom.xml. This will allow you to run the integration-tests using maven and allows you to deploy and configure the WildFly container itself. <profiles> <profile> <id>arquillian-wildfly-embedded</id> <dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>org.
